description: Man Utd: The Devils' Advocate podcast debate on big earners on
title: Man Utd: The Devils' Advocate podcast debate on big earners on
title_page: Man Utd: The Devils' Advocate podcast debate on big earners on - BBC Sport
maintext:
Are some players at Manchester United going backwards?
The team on The Devils' Advocate podcast have discussed the matter and wonder if getting rid of the biggest earners at the club is a first step that needs to be taken.
